attributes.action: Ban the extension of the ulez zone.
attributes.additional_details: The people of this country are financially crippled at this present moment in time. Building a new vehicle also leaves a much bigger carbon footprint than maintaining an existing one or adapting it to fit into the required environment.The added expense of paying to travel into the zone daily for which some is a necessity for medical treatment is not viable. At this present moment in time many people can ill afford to eat and keep warm let alone take on the expense of a brand new car .
attributes.background: Stop the ulez extension at a time when most people can barely afford to eat or keep warm

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. It is the responsibility of the Mayor of London and the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
